name: COVID_20
description:
This is hyper-casual game with some challenging levels, built within time period less than 48 hours, so kindly ignore minor details and enjoy the game. With the surprising award awaits when you complete all the fifteen level of game. Play fast and claim the reward before time runs out!!. Dont lose the hope before complete all the fifteen levels. Thank you for reading the description.

Assets are taken from freepik website under the premium licence and few were made by our-self with our outstanding knowledge in art class skills.

Created by 

Yokesh (yokesh@fourtyfourty.in)
